items.text: 1. Telephone by Lady Gaga ft Beyonce
items.ContentText: Whether it’s a sharp graphic cat eyeliner or Queen B’s American flag-print nails, Lady Gaga pulled out all the stops with her Coco-Cola can hair rollers in Telephone’s music video. Created by Danilo, Lady Gaga’s hairstylist, this look became one of the most iconic looks for Halloween.

Ariana Grande’s Princess Leia inspired space buns became quite popular in 2020 right after the release of the 7 Rings and were then seen on countless YouTube tutorials. TBH, who actually forgot that look? We all remember Rachel Green wearing the look for a ‘fun’ night with Ross in a popular sitcom F.R.I.E.N.D.S!

The list isn’t complete without our music industry’s favourite! Dua Lipa’s eccentric spaced out orange eye look that was paired with a nude lipstick in this music video became an all time fan favourite ever since she dropped the music video.

Madonna’s Marilyn Monroe inspired hair look with a coral eyeshadow, blushed cheeks, and shimmery lids was all things glam in this music video! We saw it making a comeback (and how) at this year’s red carpet.
